contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 31, 1957 D Edinburgh International Contest
Edinburgh International Contest 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
edinburgh-international-contest
Princes Street Gardens, Edinburgh March contest - 1st Barry Ostlere and Shepherd, 2nd Scottish CWS, 3rd Carlton Main Colliery. Hymn tune contest - 1st Ferodo Works, 2nd Scottish CWS, 3rd Clydebank Burgh. Deportment - Scottish CWS. 10 bands competed.
Feb. 6, 2011, 8:12 p.m. July 12, 2013, 9:39 a.m.
1 Carlton Main Frickley Colliery Band Jack Atherton The Frogs of Aristophanes
2 Cooperation Band Elgar Clayton Pageantry
3 Ferodo Works Band George Hespe An Epic Symphony
4 Yorkshire Imperial Brass Band Bernard Burns Oliver Cromwell
Unknown Result Agnes Street Band Ernest Ruddock From the New World [arr. Rimmer]
Unknown Result Clydebank Burgh Band Alex Mortimer The Frogs of Aristophanes
Unknown Result Barry, Ostlere & Shepherd John Faulds Lorenzo
Unknown Result Markham Main Colliery Band Stanley Boddington Rhapsody in Brass
Withdrawn Westoe Band Unknown
